items.label: 539fcbadec4f024d2f54080a
items.description:
Residential Heat Rate (RHR) 
200 amps and under

* Applicable to Residential customers of the Corporation who have permanent electric resistance heat and/or electric heat pump space heating systems. This rate is not available to seasonal loads. This rate is not available to Residential of Day (TOD) customers. 
* Customers taking electric service under this rate schedule must have Corporation approved meter installations and any additional equipment required by the Corporation necessary to meter the electric heat installation loads identified above separately from other loads.  
* Rate buy (Oct-Apr)($0.02598) = Energy Charge ($0.05352) - Heat Credit ($0.02754) 
* Rate buy (May-Sept) = Energy Charge ($0.05352) 
* Adjustments = the Cost of Power Adjustment (COPA) 2012 ($0.009635)
items.name: RESIDENTIAL HEAT RATE (RHR) - 200 amps and under
